post:
Hey,

Just to quickly inform you guys that the beta is now live with over 400+ sign-ups received! After over 3 years of work,  after making several promises of it launching in 2017 and 2018, it has now finally entered in to beta.

If you still wish to participate, sign up at https://forms.gle/YRZFC3JC3Bszuzr36 and be sure to join our Discord at https://discord.gg/k6JwEu7
